thread.title: Mother poses her two children on rail tracks for a selfie as Network Rail warns people not to take selfies in dangerous places
thread.title_full: Mother poses her two children on rail tracks for a selfie as Network Rail warns people not to take selfies in dangerous places

author: Helena Horton
title: Mother poses her two children on rail tracks for a selfie as Network Rail warns people not to take selfies in dangerous places
text: UK News Woman caught on CCTV posing children for photograph on rail tracks Network rail releases CCTV as a warning after eight separate incidents in one day at Matlock Bath station, including people taking selfies on the tracks
